messages.text: Hi, I'm ringing about my home insurance policy. I have a question about my cover.
I'm sorry to hear about the water damage. I'm here to help. Can you please provide me with your policy number?
My policy number is POL-2024-1234. I want to know if my roof damage is covered under my current plan.
Thank you for that information. Let me look up your policy details. Your home insurance includes cover for roof damage with a £1000 excess.
Okay, that's good to know. So what's the next step? What do I need to do?

Great question. Weather damage like storm or hail is covered under your buildings cover. The excess is £1000. However, for more complex claims involving multiple areas of damage, I recommend speaking with our claims handler.
That makes sense. How long does the claims process usually take?

Once we receive all documentation, claims typically take 10-15 business days to process. However, since water damage can be complex and require professional restoration, I think it would be better to connect you with one of our claims handlers.
That sounds good. Will they be able to help me with everything?
Yes, absolutely. They handle water damage claims regularly and can guide you through the entire process, including arranging for a professional damage assessment.
Perfect. Let me connect you with Tom Williams, one of our senior claims handlers. He'll take excellent care of you.
You're being connected now. Please hold for just one moment.
You're welcome! Tom will be with you in just a moment.

dwelling.description: Covers the structure of your home and attached structures

personalProperty.description: Covers your belongings inside the home

liabilityProtection.description: Covers legal responsibility for injuries and damages to others

medicalPayments.description: Covers medical expenses for guests injured on your property

additionalLiving.description: Covers temporary living expenses if home is uninhabitable

waterBackup.description: Covers damage from sump pump failure or backup of sewers

coveredPerils: Weight of ice, snow, or sleet
Interior water damage from HVAC systems

claimDetails.incidentDescription: Basement water damage from heavy rainfall
